message:
Command `curl -X POST -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" \
-H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls \
-d '{
  "title": "feat: Add code review cycle microagent",
  "head": "feat/code-review-cycle-microagent",
  "base": "main",
  "body": "## Description

This PR adds a new microagent for handling iterative code review cycles. The microagent provides guidance for:

1. **Systematic Review Process**: After creating a PR and marking it ready to review, wait 5 minutes for Google Code Assist and other agents to provide feedback
2. **Retry Mechanism**: If no comments are received after 5 minutes, wait 5 more minutes and try one last time
3. **Comprehensive Comment Addressing**: Thoroughly review and implement all feedback from code reviews
4. **Cycle Management**: Close the current PR and open a new one to trigger fresh reviews
5. **Maximum Iterations**: Repeat the cycle for a maximum of 10 iterations

## Changes Made

- Created `.openhands/microagents/code-review-cycle.md` with comprehensive documentation
- Implements the code review cycle workflow as specified
- Follows repository conventions and testing requirements

## Purpose

This microagent complements the existing PR Ready to Review and SheepVibes Rules microagents
- Provides structured guidance for automated code review processes
- Ensures proper handling of review comments and iterative improvements

## Testing

- [x] Microagent file created with proper YAML frontmatter and markdown content
- Follows existing microagent structure and format"` executed with exit code -1.

message.content: Let me try using curl to create the pull request directly via the GitHub API.

{"command": "curl -X POST -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" \
-H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls \
-d '{
  "title": "feat: Add code review cycle microagent",
  "head": "feat/code-review-cycle-microagent",
  "base": "main",
  "body": "## Description\n\nThis PR adds a new microagent for handling iterative code review cycles. The microagent provides guidance for:\n\n1. **Systematic Review Process**: After creating a PR and marking it ready to review, wait 5 minutes for Google Code Assist and other agents to provide feedback\n2. **Retry Mechanism**: If no comments are received after 5 minutes, wait 5 more minutes and try one last time\n3. **Comprehensive Comment Addressing**: Thoroughly review and implement all feedback from code reviews\n4. **Cycle Management**: Close the current PR and open a new one to trigger fresh reviews\n5. **Maximum Iterations**: Repeat the cycle for a maximum of 10 iterations\n\n## Changes Made\n\n- Created `.openhands/microagents/code-review-cycle.md` with comprehensive documentation\n- Implements the code review cycle workflow as specified\n- Follows repository conventions and testing requirements\n\n## Purpose\n\nThis microagent complements the existing PR Ready to Review and SheepVibes Rules microagents\n- Provides structured guidance for automated code review processes\n- Ensures proper handling of review comments and iterative improvements\n\n## Testing\n\n- [x] Microagent file created with proper YAML frontmatter and markdown content\n- Follows existing microagent structure and format"
", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash

extras.command:
curl -X POST -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" \
-H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls \
-d '{
  "title": "feat: Add code review cycle microagent",
  "head": "feat/code-review-cycle-microagent",
  "base": "main",
  "body": "## Description

This PR adds a new microagent for handling iterative code review cycles. The microagent provides guidance for:

1. **Systematic Review Process**: After creating a PR and marking it ready to review, wait 5 minutes for Google Code Assist and other agents to provide feedback
2. **Retry Mechanism**: If no comments are received after 5 minutes, wait 5 more minutes and try one last time
3. **Comprehensive Comment Addressing**: Thoroughly review and implement all feedback from code reviews
4. **Cycle Management**: Close the current PR and open a new one to trigger fresh reviews
5. **Maximum Iterations**: Repeat the cycle for a maximum of 10 iterations

## Changes Made

- Created `.openhands/microagents/code-review-cycle.md` with comprehensive documentation
- Implements the code review cycle workflow as specified
- Follows repository conventions and testing requirements

## Purpose

This microagent complements the existing PR Ready to Review and SheepVibes Rules microagents
- Provides structured guidance for automated code review processes
- Ensures proper handling of review comments and iterative improvements

## Testing

- [x] Microagent file created with proper YAML frontmatter and markdown content
- Follows existing microagent structure and format"

metadata.suffix: [The command has no new output after 10 seconds. You may wait longer to see additional output by sending empty command '', send other commands to interact with the current process, send keys ("C-c", "C-z", "C-d") to interrupt/kill the previous command before sending your new command, or use the timeout parameter in execute_bash for future commands.]
